Description:
Solid 3 Bedroom Home At A Complete Bargain Price.
Look no further the wait is over. Introducing to you 102 Osborne Avenue Clayton South that is sure to tick all boxes whether you’re a first home buyer, renovator, investor or downsizer.
3 good size rooms, accompanied with a spacious central lounge that gives you an elevated street view, and with a tidy kitchen/meals area. Both heating and cooling needs are covered with a wall heater and wall air con.
The bathroom is well presented with the convenience of having a separate shower and bath tub for the little ones or a place to relax after a hard day’s work.

The location is priceless with it only been a few steps away from Westall High School, Westall Primary school, Westall train station and newly built community hub.

Description:
Sun-filled Sanctuary in the Heart of Clayton South
*Conditional and Unconditional Offers Welcome!!!
For those who appreciate understated quality!! Where everything that has been done is carefully thought out and using only high quality design and materials that will provide years and years of enjoyments and hassle free living. This Home is for you!! An inspection will impress the most discerning of buyers.
Conveying a peaceful and private existence nestled behind a high fence and manicured front garden, this spacious, superior single-level unit is a sun-flooded sanctuary for those wanting to embrace modern family living with a low-maintenance lifestyle.
Radiating with natural light and lavished with glistening Tasmanian Oak floorboards and high ceilings throughout, the home entices you through to the contemporary kitchen and dining room, incorporating Caesarstone benches, glass splashbacks, stainless steel Bosch appliances, LG dishwasher, soft-close cabinetry, waterfall breakfast bench plus a solar powered skylight, allowing temperature control. Warm ambience filters through to the adjoining living domain, showcasing contemporary pendant lighting.
Glass sliding doors offer an indoor-outdoor connection, extending the space outside onto a superb north-facing alfresco deck and landscaped rear garden, ready for enviable Summer entertaining and relaxing with family and friends.
Quality family accommodation comprises three bedrooms boasting mirrored robes, serviced by a modern family bathroom with toilet, laundry and second toilet. Completing this outstanding package, buyers will appreciate ducted heating, reverse-cycle air conditioning, water tank plus new double carport.
Perfect for those downsizing from the family home, young families or investors. Conveniently, close to Clayton South Primary, Westall Secondary, Clayton Train Station, buses, Centre Rd shops and restaurants, Keeley Park, Clayton Aquatics and Health club, local recreation parks, a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, plus Monash and EastLink Freeways.
- Full electrical rewiring with safety certification
- Complete sewer replacement with certification
- Complete concrete restumping
- Full colour bond guttering replacement
- New architect designed two car carport
- New kitchen with Caesarstone bench tops and Bosch appliances
- Renovated bathroom
- New Merbau hardwood outdoor entertainment deck

An immaculate and light-filled designer home that is presented as new, this up-lifting two bedroom townhouse promises a cosmopolitan urban lifestyle and ticks all the boxes for an astute residential investment.
